Row.Cell: - Welcome to your OneNote password storage bank - powered by UCOVI Pinpoint. Welcome to your OneNote password storage bank - powered by UCOVI Pinpoint.

span.RawText: How to Use and Update
span.HTML: How to Use and Update

span.RawText: This OneNote section is password-protected by you and stores all of your important passwords and PINs in the table in the Password Bank page.
span.HTML: This OneNote section is password-protected by you and stores all of your important passwords and PINs in the table in the Password Bank page.

span.RawText: It is recommended to add new passwords or edit existing ones in the UCOVI Pinpoint application.
span.HTML: It is recommended to add new passwords or edit existing ones in the UCOVI Pinpoint application.

span.RawText: In the Password Bank page, click anywhere in the table to show the
span.HTML: In the Password Bank page, click anywhere in the table to show the

span.RawText: Table
span.HTML: Table

span.RawText: tab in the ribbon above, where you can:
span.HTML: tab in the ribbon above, where you can:

span.RawText: Sort the rows as you wish by:
span.HTML: Sort the rows as you wish by:

span.RawText: Any column alphabetically (Select Table, then Sort>Sort Selected Rows).
span.HTML: Any column alphabetically (Select Table, then Sort>Sort Selected Rows).

span.RawText: Last Modified Sort
span.HTML: Last Modified Sort

span.RawText: column, to arrange by when the password was last updated (same steps as above).
span.HTML: column, to arrange by when the password was last updated (same steps as above).

span.RawText: Select specific cells of the table to add colour shading or other formats such as bold text.
span.HTML: Select specific cells of the table to add colour shading or other formats such as bold text.

span.RawText: You can add or edit a password in the table directly in OneNote, but this will not generate values for Date Last Modified, Last Modified Sort or Strength.
span.HTML: You can add or edit a password in the table directly in OneNote, but this will not generate values for Date Last Modified, Last Modified Sort or Strength.

span.RawText: If you wish to edit in OneNote, do not add any new tables, as the application will not be able to pick these up, should you wish to use it for future editing or password strength analysis.
span.HTML: If you wish to edit in OneNote, do not add any new tables, as the application will not be able to pick these up, should you wish to use it for future editing or password strength analysis.

span.RawText: Do
span.HTML: Do

span.RawText: not
span.HTML: not

span.RawText: click
span.HTML: click

span.RawText: Convert to Excel Spreadsheet
span.HTML: Convert to Excel Spreadsheet

span.RawText: in the
span.HTML: in the

span.RawText: Table
span.HTML: Table

span.RawText: ribbon options, as this cannot be reversed with the Undo button.
span.HTML: ribbon options, as this cannot be reversed with the Undo button.

span.RawText: Digital Security Insights
span.HTML: Digital Security Insights

span.RawText: The Insights page contains summary statistics on the PINs and passwords in your Password Bank. These are accurate as of the last time you ran Generate Insights in the UCOVI Pinpoint application, and show you how secure you are online by measuring the overall strength of the individual passwords you choose as well as the variation across all of them.
span.HTML: The Insights page contains summary statistics on the PINs and passwords in your Password Bank. These are accurate as of the last time you ran Generate Insights in the UCOVI Pinpoint application, and show you how secure you are online by measuring the overall strength of the individual passwords you choose as well as the variation across all of them.

span.RawText: The password-strength analysis on the Insights page aggregates the scores in the
span.HTML: The password-strength analysis on the Insights page aggregates the scores in the

span.RawText: Strength
span.HTML: Strength

span.RawText: column for each password or pin in your Password Bank.
span.HTML: column for each password or pin in your Password Bank.

span.RawText: These scores are calculated as follows:
span.HTML: These scores are calculated as follows:

span.RawText: For passwords, the Hyve Systems Password Table 2023 is used, with additional points awarded if multi-factor authentication is used (2FA column).
span.HTML: For passwords, the Hyve Systems Password Table 2023 is used, with additional points awarded if multi-factor authentication is used (2FA column).

span.RawText: For PINs, strength scores increase based on the following factors:
span.HTML: For PINs, strength scores increase based on the following factors:

span.RawText: Scarcity of use based on analysis from Data Genetics.
span.HTML: Scarcity of use based on analysis from Data Genetics

span.RawText: Length (6 digits is more secure than 4).
span.HTML: Length (6 digits is more secure than 4).

span.RawText: Presence of multi-factor authentication.
span.HTML: Presence of multi-factor authentication.
